name: makeup-keyboard-trap
description: Restricts keyboard tabindex to a single subtree in the DOM
author: Ian McBurnie <ianmcburnie@hotmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell "npm run server" "npm run watch"
scripts.test: npm run build:module && npm run lasso:tests && karma start --autoWatch false --singleRun true
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run clean:tests && npm run build:docs
scripts.build: npm run build:module && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: babel docs/src/index.js --out-file docs/index.js && npm run lasso:docs && npm run clean:docs
scripts.lint: eslint src/index.js > lint.txt && eslint docs/src/index.js > lint.txt
scripts.lasso:tests: npm run clean:tests && lasso require-run:./test/index.js --name bundle-test --out test/static --config ./test/lasso-config.json
scripts.watch: onchange src/*.js docs/src/index.js -- npm run build
scripts.version: npm run prepublishOnly && git add -A docs/static test/static
